backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization mixins, counters, data models for users, posts, messaging, outreach, institutions, and various maps for storing application state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking the edit-permissions change to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of key frontend files, describing routing, pages, hooks, components, styling, and admin/outreach features.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root div and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, routing, admin auto-assignment, login tracking, and layout composition.
frontend/src/components/AdminPromotionBa: UI banner component that notifies users when they are promoted to admin with dismiss support.
frontend/src/components/BreathingAnimati: Animated breathing exercise component alternating inhale/exhale visuals and text using timed transitions.
frontend/src/components/community/Commun: Card displaying a community post with edit/delete actions, content checks, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with attribution, share dialog, and navigation support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, login/logout handling via Internet Identity, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/outreach/Outreac: Interactive map view listing outreach markers with simple grid visualization, marker selection, and satellite toggle.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for creating a user profile with form validation and a save-profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ShareWebsiteDial: Dialog providing buttons to share the site via social platforms or copy the link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers. Includes helper to create AuthClient with default options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, including profile management, admin checks, community posts, role assignment, and other domain-specific queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for a themed light/dark UI, including scrollbar styling and color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Implements the community forum page with post creation, content checking, listing, and permission logic for editing and deleting posts.
frontend/src/pages/GuidelinesPage.tsx: Displays community guidelines fetched from the backend, organizing them into themed UI sections with icons.
frontend/src/pages/HelplinePage.tsx: Renders a list of emergency helplines and online resources with styled cards and an emergency alert section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with a hero section, breathing animation, and a feature grid that navigates to other app sections.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Implements user messaging with conversations, sending messages, marking as read, and admin support features.
frontend/src/pages/MoodTrackerPage.tsx: Provides mood selection, logs user mood entries, and displays recent mood history with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachDashboardPage: Admin-focused dashboard for managing reported areas, institutions, monitoring, outreach camps, and viewing analytics.
frontend/src/pages/StressQuizPage.tsx: Runs a multiâ€‘step stress quiz, captures user answers, submits results, and displays stress levels with suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/TherapyPage.tsx: React page presenting therapy and wellness resources with tabs and a form for submitting therapy session requests using authenticated user identity.
frontend/src/utils/outreachMapLinks.ts: Utility functions to generate Google/Apple Maps URLs from coordinates and open them in a new tab.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app's features, architecture, and current implemented functionality.
